title: Hadamard Test
subtitle: Quantum Primitives with Classiq: Hadamard Test
description: Implementation of the Hadamard test, a quantum primitive that yields the real (or imaginary) part of the expectation value of a unitary for a given state. The tutorial implements it for the QFT unitary on a 4-qubit state using Classiq's high-level functional blocks, and explains the measurement and post-processing step.
